effect.diamond_pearl: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.platinum: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.platinum: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
